simple.escp.placeholder

Class ScriptPlaceholder

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.placeholder.Placeholder
      • simple.escp.placeholder.ScriptPlaceholder

  • public class ScriptPlaceholder
extends Placeholder
    This class represent a Placeholder that contains scripts that will be executed by using JSR 223 Scripting for the Java Platform API.
